Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-43040 affecting package ceph for versions less than 16.2.10-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-43040 affecting package ceph for versions less than 16.2.10-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package ceph is earlier than 16.2.10-4, affected by CVE-2023-43040
